eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LAW ENFORCEMENT WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Adams, NE; AT 10:20 PM ON OCT 09, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:20 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: THE SUSPECT HAS BEEN CAPTURED AND IS IN POLICE CUSTODY.  ALL CLEAR TO RESUME NORMAL ACTIVITY THE DANGEROUS SUBJECT IN NORTHERN ADAMS COUNTY HAS BEEN CAPTURED AND IS IN POLICE CUSTODY. IT IS SAFE TO RESUME TO NORMAL ACTIVITIES
